importantArticles.headline: CHICAGO, April 08, 2025--Coeur Mining, Inc. ("Coeur" or the "Company") (NYSE: CDE) today announced that it will report its first quarter 2025 operational and financial results after the New York Stock Exchange closes for trading on Wednesday, May 7, 2025. The Company will be hosting a conference call at 11:00 a.m. Eastern Time (10:00 a.m. Central Time) on Thursday, May 8, 2025.
importantArticles.title: Coeur Announces First Quarter 2025 Earnings Call

importantArticles.headline: VANCOUVER, British Columbia, April 03, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Walker Lane Resources Ltd. (TSX-V: WLR, “Walker Lane”) announces that there has been unusual trading activity of its common shares that appeared to initiate on March 27, 2025 and appears to have occurred on each subsequent TSX-V trading day to current day. importantArticles.headline: CHICAGO, March 27, 2025--Coeur Mining, Inc.’s ("Coeur" or the "Company") (NYSE: CDE) Senior Vice President and Chief Financial Officer, Thomas S. Whelan, will present at Mining Forum Europe in Zurich, Switzerland on Tuesday, April 1, 2025 at 11:20 a.m. Central European Time.
